comment: Coal used for power generation: In 2018 it was applied 10%, 2019 25%, and in 2020 50% of the normal carbon tax applied to coal, calculated using a tax rate of 6,85 EUR/tonneCO2 in 2018 and 5 EUR/tonneCO2 in 2019 and 2020
